name: Sightline
description:
(made a minor edit after submission to fix a game-breaking bug where you could "move" while hidden and tables not being cleaned up when starting a new level)

Sightline is a stealth game where you can reveal a widening area of the map, at the cost of revealing your position to your enemies.

--HOW TO PLAY--

Didn't have time to make a tutorial for the jam, so this will have to do.

CONTROLS

WASD - Movement

Space - Expand sight range

Q, E (hold) - Rotate camera

1 thru 5 - Interact with objects

GAMEPLAY

There are three pieces of intel to collect throughout the level. Collecting all of them will open up the level exit, denoted by rising, glowing white rings.

As you collect intel, be careful to not let enemies within range of you for too long. You can't fight back, so being caught means game over.

As you expand your sight range, enemies in that range will be alerted to your presence in two stages, the second of which will cause them to investigate your current position.

There are also crates throughout the level that you are able to hide in by interacting with them.
